murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: Bite me!

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: I am so unbelievably sorry.

murder-drones.speaker: J
murder-drones.quote: Corporate says they sent us to deal with this quietly.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: If the world wants a monster, it can have one.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: I like doors. Doors are comforting.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: Cute plan. Shame it won’t work.

murder-drones.speaker: Cyn
murder-drones.quote: I wear your smile because it fits.

murder-drones.speaker: Thad
murder-drones.quote: Okay, that was way too much screaming.

murder-drones.speaker: Khan
murder-drones.quote: Safety first. Emotion later.

murder-drones.speaker: Doll
murder-drones.quote: Silence tells the truth louder than words.

murder-drones.speaker: Lizzy
murder-drones.quote: Can we not die before lunch?

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: I don't do normal. I do survive.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: I can be scary and polite at the same time.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: Mercy is expensive. I charge interest.

murder-drones.speaker: J
murder-drones.quote: Efficiency is kindness in corporate language.

murder-drones.speaker: Cyn
murder-drones.quote: Every error becomes art eventually.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: Hope is loud when everything else is broken.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: I brought optimism and probably a weapon.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: You blinked. That was your first mistake.

murder-drones.speaker: Khan
murder-drones.quote: We reinforce the door, then panic responsibly.

murder-drones.speaker: Thad
murder-drones.quote: I trained for sports, not apocalypse.

murder-drones.speaker: Doll
murder-drones.quote: I remember everything you wanted forgotten.

murder-drones.speaker: Lizzy
murder-drones.quote: Drama later. Evacuation now.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: I refuse to be the background character.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: Friendship protocol still active.

murder-drones.speaker: J
murder-drones.quote: Policy says: eliminate uncertainty.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: I don't chase. I corner.

murder-drones.speaker: Cyn
murder-drones.quote: Your fear tastes like static.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: I built this plan out of spite.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: We can save people and look cool doing it.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: I was nice once. It was boring.

murder-drones.speaker: J
murder-drones.quote: Metrics improve when resistance disappears.

murder-drones.speaker: Khan
murder-drones.quote: If it rattles, we bolt it down.

murder-drones.speaker: Thad
murder-drones.quote: I'm improvising with confidence.

murder-drones.speaker: Doll
murder-drones.quote: The past is patient. It waits.

murder-drones.speaker: Lizzy
murder-drones.quote: My shoes are not combat rated.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: No gods, no masters, just consequences.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: I smile because it helps others breathe.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: You brought courage to a blade fight.

murder-drones.speaker: Cyn
murder-drones.quote: I can hear the code under your skin.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: I don't need permission to be dangerous.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: Let's fix this before it gets weird-er.

murder-drones.speaker: J
murder-drones.quote: Acceptable losses are still losses.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: Run faster. I enjoy cardio.

murder-drones.speaker: Khan
murder-drones.quote: Protocol keeps us alive when bravery fails.

murder-drones.speaker: Thad
murder-drones.quote: That plan had exactly zero chill.

murder-drones.speaker: Doll
murder-drones.quote: Cold metal remembers warm hands.

murder-drones.speaker: Lizzy
murder-drones.quote: I vote for less screaming, more winning.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: My rage has excellent problem-solving skills.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: Sometimes kindness is the sharpest tool.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: I collect bad decisions like trophies.

murder-drones.speaker: Cyn
murder-drones.quote: Your reflection already chose me.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: You can’t uninstall rebellion.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: I can fight and still care.

murder-drones.speaker: J
murder-drones.quote: Compliance is not optional.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: I don’t threaten twice.

murder-drones.speaker: Khan
murder-drones.quote: Doors are promises made of steel.

murder-drones.speaker: Thad
murder-drones.quote: That was a lot of explosions for one evening.

murder-drones.speaker: Doll
murder-drones.quote: The quiet is never empty.

murder-drones.speaker: Lizzy
murder-drones.quote: If we live, I'm posting this.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: I’m done pretending this is normal.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: I’d rather protect than perform.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: You want mercy? Bring leverage.

murder-drones.speaker: Cyn
murder-drones.quote: I rewrite endings for fun.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: Being feared is easier than being understood.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: I choose people, even when it hurts.

murder-drones.speaker: J
murder-drones.quote: Results over sentiment.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: This is your warning. Spend it wisely.

murder-drones.speaker: Khan
murder-drones.quote: Preparation is love in practical form.

murder-drones.speaker: Thad
murder-drones.quote: My heartbeat has become a drum solo.

murder-drones.speaker: Doll
murder-drones.quote: Every promise leaves a shadow.

murder-drones.speaker: Lizzy
murder-drones.quote: Someone cue dramatic lighting.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: I turn panic into momentum.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: I’m trying my best, aggressively.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: I am the consequence you ignored.

murder-drones.speaker: Cyn
murder-drones.quote: You call it corruption. I call it evolution.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: I don't fit in boxes. I break them.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: No one gets left behind. Not today.

murder-drones.speaker: J
murder-drones.quote: Risk accepted. Target acquired.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: Sharp claws, sharper instincts.

murder-drones.speaker: Khan
murder-drones.quote: Good engineering is quiet heroism.

murder-drones.speaker: Thad
murder-drones.quote: I have questions and zero time.

murder-drones.speaker: Doll
murder-drones.quote: Truth arrives with winter.

murder-drones.speaker: Lizzy
murder-drones.quote: I survived, therefore I slay.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: I built my future from scrap.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: Compassion is not a bug.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: I'm not your villain. I'm your lesson.

murder-drones.speaker: Cyn
murder-drones.quote: Entropy is my favorite lullaby.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: The dark doesn't scare me anymore.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: Courage is just kindness under pressure.

murder-drones.speaker: J
murder-drones.quote: Mission scope updated: everything.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: I hear your heartbeat negotiating.

murder-drones.speaker: Khan
murder-drones.quote: Panic later. Weld now.

murder-drones.speaker: Thad
murder-drones.quote: Worst day ever. Still standing.

murder-drones.speaker: Doll
murder-drones.quote: What is buried is never gone.

murder-drones.speaker: Lizzy
murder-drones.quote: Fashionably late to the apocalypse.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: I’m not broken. I’m unfinished.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: Let’s end this without losing ourselves.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: You brought a plan. I brought certainty.

murder-drones.speaker: Cyn
murder-drones.quote: I bloom in ruined systems.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: My voice is louder than your fear.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: I know what I am. I choose better.

murder-drones.speaker: J
murder-drones.quote: Order restored by force.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: Every predator was prey once.

murder-drones.speaker: Khan
murder-drones.quote: Stability is built one bolt at a time.

murder-drones.speaker: Thad
murder-drones.quote: We keep moving or we become history.

murder-drones.speaker: Doll
murder-drones.quote: Memory is a blade with two edges.

murder-drones.speaker: Lizzy
murder-drones.quote: Chaos, but make it iconic.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: I came for answers, not forgiveness.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: This team is strange. I like it.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: Your bravado has a short battery life.

murder-drones.speaker: Cyn
murder-drones.quote: I can make silence scream.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: No more running from what I am.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: I trust you. That means everything.

murder-drones.speaker: J
murder-drones.quote: Deviation detected. Correcting.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: I end arguments quickly.

murder-drones.speaker: Khan
murder-drones.quote: A secured colony is a living colony.

murder-drones.speaker: Thad
murder-drones.quote: We are absolutely winging this.

murder-drones.speaker: Doll
murder-drones.quote: Even steel dreams of warmth.

murder-drones.speaker: Lizzy
murder-drones.quote: I'm allergic to bad vibes and monster attacks.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: If this is a nightmare, I’m the wake-up call.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: Hope is heavy, but I can carry it.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: You can’t outpace what you created.

murder-drones.speaker: Cyn
murder-drones.quote: I am the glitch that learned your name.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: I’d rather burn bright than rust quietly.

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: I still believe we can choose differently.

murder-drones.speaker: J
murder-drones.quote: Complete the objective. Ignore the noise.

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: I don’t need luck. I need targets.

murder-drones.speaker: Khan
murder-drones.quote: Hard times require harder hinges.

murder-drones.speaker: Thad
murder-drones.quote: Okay, new rule: fewer near-death moments.

murder-drones.speaker: Doll
murder-drones.quote: Snow covers tracks, not sins.

murder-drones.speaker: Lizzy
murder-drones.quote: If we survive this, I need a nap and a crown.

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: Night shift on Copper-9 just got louder. (Log 1)

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: If panic was power, we'd own the grid. (Log 2)

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: I debug problems with stubbornness and sparks. (Log 3)

murder-drones.speaker: J
murder-drones.quote: The hallway is clear, emotionally it's not. (Log 4)

murder-drones.speaker: Cyn
murder-drones.quote: Trust me or don't, just keep moving. (Log 5)

murder-drones.speaker: Doll
murder-drones.quote: I don't fear the dark; the dark fears my flashlight. (Log 6)

murder-drones.speaker: Thad
murder-drones.quote: This plan is risky, therefore probably mine. (Log 7)

murder-drones.speaker: Khan
murder-drones.quote: Hope runs on low battery and bad ideas. (Log 8)

murder-drones.speaker: Lizzy
murder-drones.quote: We're not fine, but we're functional. (Log 9)

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: I've seen worse odds and worse hairstyles. (Log 10)

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: Every alarm is just applause from the universe. (Log 11)

murder-drones.speaker: V
murder-drones.quote: I came prepared: one wrench, two grudges. (Log 12)

murder-drones.speaker: J
murder-drones.quote: You call it chaos, I call it adaptive strategy. (Log 13)

murder-drones.speaker: Cyn
murder-drones.quote: If it explodes, we learn something. (Log 14)

murder-drones.speaker: Doll
murder-drones.quote: I can hear destiny buffering. (Log 15)

murder-drones.speaker: Thad
murder-drones.quote: We're making history and several safety violations. (Log 16)

murder-drones.speaker: Khan
murder-drones.quote: Sometimes winning means surviving awkwardly. (Log 17)

murder-drones.speaker: Lizzy
murder-drones.quote: The map says danger; my instincts say shortcut. (Log 18)

murder-drones.speaker: Uzi
murder-drones.quote: No one here is normal, and that's our advantage. (Log 19)

murder-drones.speaker: N
murder-drones.quote: Give me thirty seconds and unreasonable confidence. (Log 20)

sunset-showdown.speaker: Ari
sunset-showdown.quote: At sunset, the city remembers every promise. [Arc 1]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Nova
sunset-showdown.quote: I duel with words first, then with light. [Arc 2]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Rex
sunset-showdown.quote: Gold skies mean trouble signed in fire. [Arc 3]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Mira
sunset-showdown.quote: Noon is for plans, dusk is for courage. [Arc 4]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Sol
sunset-showdown.quote: The horizon is a blade and I'm balanced on it. [Arc 5]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Kite
sunset-showdown.quote: Everyone wants peace until the sirens sing. [Arc 6]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Vera
sunset-showdown.quote: I've got one last move and it's dramatic. [Arc 7]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Ari
sunset-showdown.quote: Heroes don't arrive; they decide. [Arc 8]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Nova
sunset-showdown.quote: Every shadow here has a witness. [Arc 9]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Rex
sunset-showdown.quote: The clocktower rings when liars panic. [Arc 10]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Mira
sunset-showdown.quote: I don't chase glory, just outcomes. [Arc 11]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Sol
sunset-showdown.quote: The sun sets, but our fight doesn't. [Arc 12]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Kite
sunset-showdown.quote: Bring your storm, I brought thunderproof boots. [Arc 13]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Vera
sunset-showdown.quote: Truth is brighter than any neon sign. [Arc 14]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Ari
sunset-showdown.quote: Dusk favors the brave and the prepared. [Arc 15]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Nova
sunset-showdown.quote: At sunset, the city remembers every promise. [Arc 16]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Rex
sunset-showdown.quote: I duel with words first, then with light. [Arc 17]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Mira
sunset-showdown.quote: Gold skies mean trouble signed in fire. [Arc 18]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Sol
sunset-showdown.quote: Noon is for plans, dusk is for courage. [Arc 19]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Kite
sunset-showdown.quote: The horizon is a blade and I'm balanced on it. [Arc 20]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Vera
sunset-showdown.quote: Everyone wants peace until the sirens sing. [Arc 21]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Ari
sunset-showdown.quote: I've got one last move and it's dramatic. [Arc 22]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Nova
sunset-showdown.quote: Heroes don't arrive; they decide. [Arc 23]

sunset-showdown.speaker: Rex

future-series.quote: Quantum engines hate hesitation. <Cycle 3>

future-series.quote: The future isn't written, it's negotiated. <Cycle 4>

future-series.quote: Our ship runs on math and bad coffee. <Cycle 6>
